description: The outline of the symbol layer.
title: Outline

$eref.description: Color is represented as a three or four-element array. The four elements represent values for red, green, blue, and alpha in that order. Values range from 0 through 255. If color is undefined for a symbol, the color value is null.
$eref.title: color

___size.description: Outline size in points, positive only

___transparency.description: The value has to lie between `100` (full transparency) and `0` (full opacity).
